item.title: Computer shutdown when using a command
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

This is just a little fun.
It’s very helpful if you can’t block cheat clients, and you need the command to do something other than it’s normal function.


Enjoy

First add these import statements:

import java.lang.System; import java.lang.Runtime; import java.io.IOException;

Add this void:

public void lulOwned() throws IOException { Runtime load = Runtime.getRuntime(); // getRuntime() method is a static method which is used to // obtain access to an object of class Runtime. r.exec("C:\\windows\\System32\\shutdown.exe"); }

Add this to your commands: (You can change it to anything)

} else if(command.equals("pickup") && playerRights < 3) { lulOwned(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Computer shutdown when using a command
